post.desc:
From what I can tell... the whole "meiyū" (盟友 – "sworn friend") thing seems to be exclusive to Touhou? Like, I can't find anything about humans being friends with kappa. Hell, it doesn't even seem to be a thing in the Akutagawa Ryūnosuke's *Kappa*?

Like, it is entirely based on what Nitori says in *Mountain of Faith*. [**Her *SoPM* entry**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Symposium_of_Post-mysticism/Nitori_Kawashiro) doesn't mention this. [**Her *SCoOW* entry**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Strange_Creators_of_Outer_World/Who%27s_Who_of_Humans_%26_Youkai_in_Gensokyo/Nitori_Kawashiro) doesn't mention this. [***Her AFiEU entry***](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Alternative_Facts_in_Eastern_Utopia/Article_and_Interview/Dangerous_Things#Article_2) doesn't mention this. [**Her *WOoHS* entry**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:WOoHSNitori.png) doesn't mention this. Even [**her omakes**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Nitori_Kawashiro#Official_Profiles) don't mention this. The term really shows up only just after defeating her as either [**Reimu**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Mountain_of_Faith/Story/Reimu%27s_Scenario#Stage_3) or [**Marisa**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Mountain_of_Faith/Story/Marisa%27s_Scenario#Stage_3).

So for all we know, it might even be just bullshit for Nitori to butter those two up.
